de.notIOC.configuration
Class ConfigurationManager

java.lang.Object
  de.notIOC.configuration.ConfigurationManager

public class ConfigurationManager
extends java.lang.Object

ConfigurationManager is a Singleton...

... and used for get the configuration.
He delivers the central configuration path and objects of type ConfigProperty.

The ConfigurationManager should be initialized by the method setInitialEnvironment(). If not he uses default values.

See Also:
setInitialEnvironment().

Method Detail

setInitialEnvironment

public static void setInitialEnvironment(java.lang.String homeVariableName,
                                         java.lang.String baseConfPath,
                                         java.lang.String baseConfFile)
The configuration manager must know where the configuration is stored.
Typically there must be set a central HOME variable, a path (folder) where the configuration file is stored and a configuration file.
The configuration is searched in this path: $NOT_EOF_HOME/conf/noteof_master.xml

Parameters:
homeVariableName - e.g. NOT_EOF_HOME (default)
baseConfPath - e.g. conf (default)
baseConfFile - e.g. noteof_master.xml (default)

getInstance

public static ConfigurationManager getInstance()

getConfigurationManager

public ConfigurationManager getConfigurationManager()
                                             throws NotIOCException
Delivers the manager itself.
Normally the manager is not requested by other objects except for the central configuration management.
It is recommended to use the configuration object Configuration (getConfiguration()).

Returns:
Single instance of ConfigurationManager
Throws:
NotIOCException

getApplicationHome

public static java.lang.String getApplicationHome()
Returns:
Central configuration path (CFGROOT, NOTEOF_HOME)

getConfigRoot

public java.lang.String getConfigRoot()
Returns:
The central configuration path of the server application (CFGROOT or NOTEOF_HOME) like $NOTEOF_HOME/conf

getProperty

public static ConfigProperty getProperty(java.lang.String nodeName)
                                  throws NotIOCException
Delivers the value to a configuration key ignoring the ConfigurationManager environment.

Parameters:
nodeName - Complete path of key.
Returns:
A configuration object which can be part of the whole project configuration.
Throws:
NotIOCException
